text_block_list.text:
In the depths of a certain mountain, There 
was a small wizard who lived quietly.

However, I know how to use magic, “what 
is my power for?” I was worried

That is when one night, I read a picture book depicting the 
outside world in the moonlight.

In the picture book, people living in 
the outside world were depicted.
It looks fun. I'd like to go, too.
The excited wizard began to admire the outside world very much

And began to think that I might be able to make the outside world 
happier if I used my magic.

at dawn, in the morning 
the sun illuminates the outside world.

The wizard began to walk into the outside 
world, hoping to make everyone happy.

A few days after Mejiro McQueen won the 2nd consecutive title of 
the “Emperor Prize” in the spring.
The training of team was getting more and more enthusiastic.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
text_block_list.text: I did it! I beat my own best record again today
The team members continue to grow their own records.
The atmosphere of the team is at its highest peak.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: ha, ha, ha, ha……
At the same time, McQueen was in training to set a new record.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
After all, McQueen is amazing. Running from this distance, her 
pace and form are not disturbed at all.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
text_block_list.text:
Isn't there any more horse girls that can 
beat McQueen-san over long distances?

It is true that there are not many horse girls that can compete 
with Mejiro McQueen in long distances right now.
However, my gaze had been attracted to another horse girl.
However, my gaze had been attracted to another horse girl.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: heh, heh, heh, heh……

Recently, Rice Shower newly joined the team. Was worried that the 
expected result would come out.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
oh, Rice is already exhausted. Her running 
is completely out of order.

Indeed, compared to Mejiro McQueen, Rice 
Showers run still needs more work.

Indeed, compared to Mejiro McQueen, Rice 
Showers run still needs more work.
She continues to stare at Mejiro McQueen's back.
No matter how painful it is, it will never disappear.
And more than anything.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: heh, heh, heh, heh……

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: not yet……not yet, not yet…… more, until the end……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: …… No way, I can't believe your following me this far, but___

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ……Ehhh!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: ha, ha, ha, ha……

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: heh, heh, heh, heh……

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Go- - - - al! 
Isn't the record time updated again!

text_block_list.name: Droopy-eyed Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Wow, Wow, Wow

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
text_block_list.text:
As expected of the Tennoshou horse girl! as expected from the 
Ace!, Right Trainer-san!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Hey. could you please stop that.
But Rice also had a good run.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: heh, heh…… huh, Rice?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Even though it looked bad, you showed me your guts from here.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
But if Rice really had a good run, 
then why can't I win in a race……

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
In the Satsuki Sho, and the last race. 
I tried, but I ended in 8th place.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Even if you say that, you were stuck on 
McQueen for 50m. It's a big deal.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: heh…… but……

You have to be self-confident. “I can run,” it is necessary to 
have that kind of positive feeling.

You have to be self-confident. “I can run,” it is necessary to 
have that kind of positive feeling.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Also, there is something that I made 
sure of when we ran together.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: It is “distance”.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ehh, “distance”……?
Yeah, Rice has a short, thin, lean body…… and this leg.
Rice, your suitability is definitely a “stayer”
Rice, your suitability is definitely a “stayer”

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Rice is a stayer…… 
the same as McQueen-san……

Yes, if the distance is extended. Rice's ability 
will be utilized more. A longer distance is desirable 
more than a race where Rice was 8th.

Actually, there is a race of 2400m in the immediate vicinity. I 
have a good idea of what to do.

Actually, there is a race of 2400m in the immediate vicinity. I 
have a good idea of what to do.

So far, except for Rice Shower, the members' expressions changed 
as if they guessed something.

Rice Showers next race is special for a horse girl. That race 
that determines the top.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ”Japan Derby”?

The cry of Rice Shower, similar to a sad chant, 
ran through the training course as if it was 
reminiscent of her running from now on.
